transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir good evening.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir Saransh baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se kaise hain aap?
Customer: Haan boliye sir.
Executive: Ji ji actually morning mein aap busy the aap drive kar rahe the maine baad mein bhi call kiya tha. Are kal savere apne meeting karte hain uske liye to.
Customer: Actually main aapko ye puchna chahta tha aapka ek feedback aaya tha employee ke regarding uski conversation ke liye to main jaanna chahta tha koi employee ki taraf. Kai ke liye?
Customer: Employee ke behavior ki taraf se to koi issue nahi hai sir.
Executive: Kiski vajah se?
Customer: Employee ke behavior ki vajah se to koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Haan wo hai hi nahi wahi issue hai. Pehle mere ko TrustSeal ka label aata hai wo kitna charge lete hain?
Customer: Wo 50000 plus GST hai hamara.
Customer: Ab mera basic plan hai already.
Executive: Basic plan aap already chala rahe hain jismein aap logon ne abhi humein kuch 37760 pay kiya hua hai ji.
Customer: Haan to ab uska sirf khali apne ko basic TrustSeal wala aati hai to kitne pay karna padenge abhi extra?
Executive: TrustSeal wala agar aap pay karenge to 21240 kuch aa raha hai ye.
Customer: Barabar ab unhone mere ko 30000 bola fir 27 pe 28 pe 25 pe 21 pe is tarah is tarah thodi na negotiation hota hai. Professional work hai to fir wo work usi type se hota hai jo company charges. Aap kya TrustSeal aap TrustSeal lena chahte the TrustSeal ke bare mein?
Customer: Haan usi liye TrustSeal lena chahte the isliye mere ko pehle 15000 bola gaya tha. 20 din pehle baat hui thi tab ab wo 15000 bola maine kaha ek do din baat karte hain apne uske baad maine abhi pucha to unhone direct 30000 bol diya is tarah thodi hota hai 10 din mein 15000 extra ho jata hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi main aapko batata hun kya hai ki hamara jo bhi naya seal login ho raha hai uska amount 53000 plus GST hai to 59000 betha hai theek hai aur aap logon ne jaise 37760 diya hai ye amount next time aap 21420 agar pay karte hain na to aapka ye TrustSeal one year mein complete ho jayega. To pehle pehle 20000 kyun bola tha wo jyada ka le rahe the to 21000 aapko sir agar aapko wo 30000 bol rahe hain na sir to bhi wo entry nahi kar sakte uske liye aap befikar rahiye usme agar aapko 30000 bola hai pehle to main ye check karunga ki usne bola kyun hai kis reason se bola tha dusra chaliye aap ek kam kariye kal savere aap mere ko 10 baje phone karna to apne trust ke liye payment kar dete hain aur karte hain. Accha mujhe ye ek cheez aur bataiye ji ek saal ka aapko 59000 ka padta hai jab aap do saal ke liye kyun nahi ja rahe do saal ka sasta padega aapko. Haan to wo dekhte hain pehle apne dusre bhi aapse baat karni hai mere aap mera ek kam kariye personal number se aap phone karna mere ko.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai main personal number se phone karunga ek request aur tha mera feedback aayega aapke pass. Haan ek mera feedback please share kar dijiyega main ek kar ke close wo kal main morning mein aapko morning mein call karunga theek hai thank you so much. Haan haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Regarding employee behavior and TrustSeal charges.

Resolution:

- Explained TrustSeal charges and payment process.

- Asked to call back to process payment.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back from personal number.

- Customer will share feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, charges, payment, feedback
